mapper.select: select m.id,m.msg_type,m.message,m.state,m.create_datetime, u.id as u_id, u.username as u_username, u.head_thumb as u_head_thumb from tb_chat_message as m left join tb_user as u on u.id=m.send_uid where m.state = 0 and m.read_uid = #{readUserId} and m.send_uid = #{sendUserId} order by m.create_datetime desc

select m.id,m.msg_type,m.message,m.state,m.create_datetime, u.id as u_id, u.username as u_username, u.head_thumb as u_head_thumb from tb_chat_message as m left join tb_user as u on u.id=m.send_uid where m.read_uid = #{readUserId} and m.send_uid = #{sendUserId} order by m.create_datetime desc limit #{startIndex},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_chat_message ( send_uid, read_uid, msg_type, message )values ( #{sendUser.id}, #{readUser.id}, #{msgType}, #{message} )
